column2: BRIEF-Vectrus Wins $84 Mln Sheppard Air Force Base Contract May 22 (Reuters) - Vectrus Inc: * VECTRUS SYSTEMS CORP - FIRM-FIXED-PRICE CONTRACT HAS POTENTIAL SEVEN YEAR PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE AND REPRESENTS NEW WORK TO CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Vectrus Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.54 May 8 (Reuters) - Vectrus Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $320.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $306.2 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * INCREASED 2018 GUIDANCE FOR REVENUE, NET INCOME, AND DILUTED EPS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Vectrus Says, Unit Received Notice Of $105.96 Mln Modification (P00039) To Contract W91rus-13-C-0006 April 30 (Reuters) - Vectrus Inc: * VECTRUS SAYS ON APRIL 27, UNIT RECEIVED NOTICE OF $105.96 MILLION MODIFICATION (P00039) TO CONTRACT W91RUS-13-C-0006 - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2Ks7wzY) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
